price: 98.magaalol maray Yallih farmoytit dirabboyse Ni digaala usun wallaqenta digirak keenit tamaateemik amaan maay geen?
arabic: أَوَأَمِنَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُم بَأۡسُنَا ضُحٗى وَهُمۡ يَلۡعَبُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: awa-amina ahlu al-qurā an yatiyahum basunā ḍuḥan wahum yalʿabūna
